review: Neither this one (or the larger option) can be used when driving!The manufacturer makes this clear- would be dangerous if so!This one is SMALL compared to the larger option- but can fit in a side pocket easily, & does meets a need.Best for jotting notes- supporting a burger/fries.Not appropriate for a laptop - get the bigger one for that.(It can just balance- not independently support- a Chromebook-- but NOTHING else.)Works well for a 2000 Subaru Outback Limited.Happy with purchase- good for the price.However, I did buy the larger one for more work options.
productTitle: Cutequeen Trading car 1pcs Eating/Laptop Steering Wheel Desk Black(pack of 1)
